customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Joseph Baylon - Wednesday, October 28, 2020 10:18 AM
  • Added test steps to test script and moved to active

inline.description:
Hide mobile-specific settings
--------------------
1. Login as sysadmin
2. Go to About > Edition and License - /admin_console/about/license and remove license
3. Go to Site Configuration > File Sharing and Downloads - /admin_console/site_config/file_sharing_downloads
inline.expectedResult:
After #3,
  • Verify non-mobile settings are displayed
    • Allow File Sharing
  • Verify mobile specific settings are not displayed
    • Allow File Uploads on Mobile
    • Allow File Downloads on Mobile
